Html:
Cross-posted from the Issue Tracker, as some discussion is probably warranted.

I nearly have this implemented and working with Live Writer. One problem, though: since Pages aren't assigned to an area, how should I go about dealing with security? Should anyone who can log in be able to edit/add/delete Pages? If we add the Pages to an area, will that break anything else? Should the Pages for a particular User be placed under a specific relative path? Thoughts?

As a start, you could assume that only members of a site-wide admin role can edit pages... many of the people who are looking to use this feature would be focused on a single person blog, in which case they would be editing all of the pages themselves. A more granular security method could be added in later.
